name: The Labyrinth of the Mechataur
description:
Labyrinth of the MECHATAUR is a Free-For-All fast-paced 4 local multiplayer game on orthographic perspective where you & your friends battle each other to death in test chambers. Get some random weapons from the ground and start attacking, also beware of the evil boss that tries to catch you!

  • Multiple diversity of funny weapons!
  • Choose your  favourite color for your character!
  • Run away from the Mechataur!
  • Avoid all the traps of each map to survive!
  • Don't let the EMP catch you!
